description: Luffy pumps his blood at incredible speeds throughout his body, increasing oxygen and nutrient flow. This dramatically enhances his speed and power, causing steam to emanate from his body and his skin to take on a reddish hue.

firstUse.context: Revealed during battle with Blueno on the courthouse rooftop

strengths: Can keep up with Rokushiki users like CP9
Combines well with existing Gomu Gomu techniques
weaknesses: Puts enormous strain on Luffy's body

description: A variation of the Tekkai (Iron Body) technique, one of the six Rokushiki martial arts techniques used by CP9 agents. This variant provides enhanced defensive capabilities.

firstUse.context: Used by Blueno during his battle with Luffy

strengths: Hardens the body for superior defense
Variation may have unique properties compared to standard Tekkai
weaknesses: User typically cannot move while using standard Tekkai
